recipesJson.name: Tenacious T (Live Mixing 02/09)
recipesJson.author: SkiddlzNinja
recipesJson.description: Papaya puree added to a McDonald's sweet tea. Connecticut shade to add some tea leaf earthiness.

reviews.text: This isn't what I normally think of when I'm looking for a summer ADV, but I'll be damned if this isn't pretty refreshing outside on a 90+ degree day.  Plenty sweet, plenty fruity, and has a nice earthy feel and near dryness that lends to the authenticity of a real tea.
